Package main

Class SimpliSafe

java.lang.Object
main.SimpliSafe
public class SimpliSafe
extends java.lang.Object
SimpliSafe application entry point. Initializes all GUIs and system models representing SimpliSafe devices.
Author:
Blake Hamilton

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      SimpliSafe security system entry point.
      Parameters:
      args - Command-line arguments.
      Throws:

    • refresh

      public static void refresh()
      Refreshes all GUIs so that they all reflect the BaseStation's state.

    • loadFromFile

      public static void loadFromFile​(java.io.File file, BaseStation station) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Loads and initializes device GUIs to the given BaseStation from the given file.
      Parameters:
      file - File to load devices from.
      station - Station associated with the SimpliSafe system.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - If file is not found.
